channel.title: Can Someone Help Me Make A Server?
channel.description:
can someone help me who ever does i will make them admin in my server when its gonna be up... i need help with : -commands -starter items -shops -starting places -npc with HP -talking npcs -mods admins -IP adress
note: this is my second post cuz my last one was spammed by bloop

item.title: Can Someone Help Me Make A Server?
item.dc:creator: @live_rare1942 live rare1942
item.description:
@live_rare1942 wrote:

I don’t know much aswell but I know how to get monster HP.
You need to open the “Moparscape file”
Once in there go to “Highbirdscape”
( If the file’s are unreadabull in there just open them and click chose a program and chose ‘note pad’ or ‘word art’ )
Then you must make them spawn first so open the readabull link thing called "autospawn then it comes up with somet like this. This is mine

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 494 3256 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East

Well this is top part

Type on “moparscape” as you are playing

::coordson

Then on this link thing type somet like.

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 4355 4345 6535 0 0 0 0 0 1 ???

And that will make a monster spawn then you can change the HP of the monster.
First you get of that file once you save it.
Go to

npc
CFG File
77 KB

Then look for the “ID” of the monster you spawned and put any hp you like…
Bare in mind the combat resolves as like how much can the monster hit, and dosent show up on the game.

P.S!" I have verry bad spelling! And hope you can read this. And hope it comes in use for YOU!

Read full topic
item.source: Can Someone Help Me Make A Server?
